mapper.select: select user.picture_type_id from aa_place_file file left join aa_picture_user user on user.id = file.picture_user_id left join aa_picture_type type on type.id = user.picture_type_id where type.id not in ('1152466716125380608','1152467065519292416','1152467158926442496') and file.paper_id = #{paperId}

select user.picture_type_id from aa_place_file file left join aa_picture_user user on user.id = file.picture_user_id left join aa_picture_type type on type.id = user.picture_type_id where file.exam_user_id = #{examUserId}
